Public Documents

In the spirit of transparency and accountability, we make our key organizational documents available to the public.

Bylaws

Our bylaws outline the governance structure, roles, and responsibilities of our board, and our commitment to transparency.

Conflict of Interest Policy

This policy details our procedures for managing potential conflicts of interest, including recusal and annual disclosure requirements.

Download PDF →

Narrative Description of Activities

This document provides a detailed narrative of our activities, as submitted to the IRS in our Form 1023 application.

Budget Projection

Our three-year budget projection outlines our financial plan, including anticipated revenue and expenses.

501(c)(3) Status

Empowering Native Hawaiian families, veterans, and underserved communities through culturally grounded programs.
